alert.note: Alert for Clay; Dickinson; Geary; Marshall; Morris; Pottawatomie; Riley; Washington (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 09 at 2:26PM CDT until May 09 at 2:45PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM CDT FOR EASTERN DICKINSON...GEARY...RILEY...NORTHWESTERN MORRIS...WESTERN POTTAWATOMIE...EASTERN CLAY...SOUTHEASTERN WASHINGTON AND SOUTHWESTERN MARSHALL COUNTIES... At 225 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles south of Barnes to 4 miles southwest of Manhattan to near Hope, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Manhattan, Junction City, Clay Center, Ogden, Grandview Plaza, Chapman, Wakefield, Riley, White City, Milford, Leonardville, Dwight, Olsburg, Woodbine, Randolph, Green, Palmer, Parkerville, Latimer and Milford Lake. This includes Interstate 70 between mile markers 284 and 317. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Clay; Dickinson; Geary; Marshall; Morris; Pottawatomie; Riley; Washington
